title: MOOC-Integrated Design for Higher Education Flipped Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theories and experimental methodology comprehension
context.additional_context: A blended learning structure for working adult learners, linking MOOC pre-learning with offline projects

learning_goals: Learners can explain core electrical engineering theories (e.g., circuit design, signal processing) with over 80% accuracy using MOOC content.
Learners can propose solutions to real-world industrial problems by applying the ADDIE model-based project design process.
Learners can improve their learning outcomes at least three times through peer and self-assessment in a PBL environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
